findings.rationale: Absence of indemnification provisions may expose parties to liability without recourse, increasing financial risk in case of disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The clause stating that liability shall not be limited under any circumstances can lead to significant financial exposure.
findings.evidence_quote: No event shall be limited by the limitation of liability clause.

findings.rationale: Without audit rights, the Receiving Party may not be able to verify compliance with confidentiality obligations, increasing risk of information misuse.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Absence of intellectual property protections can lead to potential misuse or unauthorized use of proprietary information.
